reviews.review: 补票，小时候玩不感到害怕。成年了却玩起来很害怕

For a game that is 24 years old, it proves to stand the test of time.
It may not have the graphics that most are used to, but would recommend to anyone looking for a solid story line.
For its age it actually really holds up. It is fun and a walkthrough may be needed for some really unclear directions given but overall I have really enjoyed my time with this game

Короче! Я эту игру еще не прошел, пройду, игра прекрасна, топ, классика, но лучше играть в Блэк Мезу, там гораздо легче, но если что я не казуальный дрочун, дело в том что в игре постоянно придется воевать с вортидаунами, ебалнаклами, и другими представителями клуба Fucking Slaves из мира Зен, но кроме них есть еще и военные, которые по моему личному и скромному мнению являются самыми сложными противниками, я так горел когда пришлось постоянно кататся туда сюда на выгонетке, уничтожать турели, отключать шлагбаумы, и все это сопровождается перестрелками с военными, отнимающие хп, и за этого я и сгорел, что все немного тянется, и придется бесполезно и почти без надежно получать пули в ебальничек, и ходит туда сюда, но однозначно, рекомендую

I mean, it's kinda the best game ever so...
I'm 18 and played this game as a kid, but I have to say it's one of the most memorable and best games of all time. Everyone knows about half life I mean c'mon. It's so advanced for its time and is a genuine masterpiece.
came for nostalgia, left with traumatic encounters with aliens. 10/10

I came for the headcrab, stayed for the headcrab.

Have played this a while ago, now coming back to this game and nothing change much. Still as good as always <3

Except for the last part of the game, Half Life is something more than a masterpiece. It's almost in a status of itself, basicly reimagining what a game can be and how far both gameplay-wise and in terms of story telling the game medium can be pushed. That's what I would say if I got the original Half Life in 1998.
Today the game still magicaly holds up and it's no wonder that it does, because many other modern FPS games were or still are in some way inspired by Half Life or use the same rules as Half Life does.
I'm glad that I've played this game, the only thing I regret is that I didn't do it sooner.
Una obra maestra, me acuerdo cuando lo jugaba por cabinas de internet con mis hermanos y nos pasábamos horas ahí. Me lo compre y vale la pena lo recomiendo <3

Old, but GoldSrc.

No, seriously you should play this old masterpiece. It is fun even by today standards and while the graphics can be considered aged, it's still a charming game with a great atmosphere and world and a great experience even in 2021.

Gioco molto vecchio, grafiche preistoriche, prima trama di uno sparatutto nella storia, ma delusione 0. Gameplay continuo e attivo, se siete amanti degli anni 90' e del vintage, ve lo consiglio
(p.s. ci ho giocato molto in passato e ora l'ho ripreso per steam)

I thought it would be like other sci fi shooter. I really thought it would be like Halo. It turns out it's somewhere between Dead Space and Halo. Holy shit!! I was not prepared for the horror and screamed at the 144p monster at midnight.
10/10 would recommend.
This was a nice little game, I would advise every gamer to play through this game at least once, it's a gaming classic!
20 years passed and  still can´t shake the shadow of black mesa...

First time playing half life title and I wasn't disspointed. Love the visual and aestetics, and movement and shooting feel smooth ([spoiler]Except the later part where the low gravity at Xen, especially climbing up the first room at boss battle was pain in the ass[/spoiler]). Did struggle little bit navigating through some levels and [spoiler] Boss at the end because it was hard to tell if it's taking the damage or not and where was the weakpoint [/spoiler] but overall it was a quick game and I enjoy it throughly.

Great nostalgic game that set the pace for this type of game genre. Even after 23 years I still find myself going back to Half Life and replaying all the way through.
